description: Nothing goes better with a fragrant Indian curry than fluffy garlic naan. Try our healthier version and enjoy fast-food flavours at home.
name: Healthier Garlic Naan Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large, non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Working in batches, cook 2 naan at a time for 2 minutes on each side or until slightly puffed and golden brown. Brush one side with a little garlic mixture. Turn naan, garlic-side down, and cook for 15 seconds or until fragrant. Serve with Healthier chicken curry.

Brush one side with a little garlic mixture. Turn naan, garlic-side down, and cook for 15 seconds or until fragrant. Serve with Healthier chicken curry.
